formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: The inter-storey drift, \( D \), is calculated as: \( D = \frac{H \times C}{S} \) Where \( H \) is the total building height, \( C \) is the drift coefficient, and \( S \) is the number of storeys.
